analyzed: tam bhinnam antam bhayam anveti khippa
tassa aham akkhim vivarim guyham attha
vācan hi mam nāsakkhim sayam etu
tad pakkhataḥ hi bhayam āgatam mama
yaḥ ve naraḥ su hadam maññamānaḥ
āsīvisaḥ dummukhā iti āhuḥ tam nara
kaḥ ni idha tiṇṇam garaham upeti
samaṇaḥ su paṇṇaḥ athavā tvam eva
tassa aham akkhim vivarim guyham attha
a labbham a vyāharatī naraḥ idha
tesam pi guyham paramam na sase
sahāyāḥ vā yassa honti sa pakkhā
tesam pi guyham paramam na sase
tassa api guyham paramam na sase
tamhi nu kho vivarim guyham attha

original: Tayo hi puttā na hi añño atthi;
analyzed: tayo hi puttā na hi aññaḥ atthi
iccā iva vākyam visajjī su paṇṇo
evam pi te saraṇam aham bhavāmi

original: Yathā yathā bhāvaṁ paro na jaññā”.
analyzed: yathā yathā bhāvam paras na jaññā
ubho samā su jayā puñña khandhā

original: Na hi nūna tuyhaṁ manaso piyamhā”.
analyzed: na hi nūna tuyham manasaḥ piyamhā
piyaḥ hi me āsi supaṇṇa rājā
na me piyam appiyam vā api hoti
ariya avakāsā asi an ariya uvā asi
kaṇha abhijātikaḥ asi an ariya rūpaḥ
mitta dubbhā pāpiyaḥ na atthi añño
indassa vākyena hi savaraḥ hataḥ iti
